extendedInfo.description: TeaChimer is a simple-to-use, reliable countdown timer that you can have always handy.  Save a timer for your favorite tea or perfect egg, and start it with a simply tap on the name.  Need a "naughty spot" timer for each child?  It's simple to set up, and you can give each one their own distinct sound at the end.  For more discrete timing needs, you can eliminate the sounds and just pop up a message on the Notifier bar.It runs in the background, even if another application has control of the screen.  See http://www.closecrowd.com/teachimer.aspx for documentation and support, or email us at closecrowd@gmail.com        **** SECURITY NOTICE ****TeaChimer uses the following permissions ONLY:  Storage    Modify/delete SD card contents  Hardware controls    Change your audio settings  System tools    Prevent phone from sleeping  Phone calls    Read phone state and identityThe last one is a result of building for Android 1.6 compatibility - TeaChimer does *NOT* actually access the phone information in any way.

reviews.title: Has on occasion silenced ringtone while running!
reviews.comment: This used to work perfectly a five star app in meeting my timer needs but lately it has on occasion switched the phone to silent mode; On HTC one ICS
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The notification does not happen when the screen shuts off.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Best flexible countdown timer did just what I wanted by saving named timers but could have slicker ui and wish could work evem if phone sleeps
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I would love it if i could delete or edit a timer. Otherwise i love it. Will reinstall it after i deinstall it so i can program it right.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This is one of the only reliable timers I could find in the market. It works!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Phone sleeps > timer dies. The overall gui is also a bit wonky
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work in landscape mode, needs other UI improvements. Keep working on it and one day this might be the best timer on the marker ;)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Validated on HTC Evo. Timers work exactly as configured. If you can\'t hear them, you didn\'t select a ringtone (or your volume is low). No Ads! - RMB
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Best timer available for Android, if your timer is set for less time than your screen timeout. Keep awake option/piggyback toggle screen timeout?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Best timer app I have found so far
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: OI countdown is better - this can\'t run more than one timer simultanneously.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great program, but it turns my ringer volume to 0 for no reason!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very rough still.  Program has some promise, but work on the UI more.  You might also want to have some defaults built in for green, black, or oolong.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: If the phone goes to sleep in the middle of the timer, the alarm won\'t go off
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Can\'t set vibrate timer. Can\'t edit existing timers. Useless.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I would rate higher except that the ONLY way to set time is tap-tap-tap. Should be able to set by typing.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Tested all timer apps and find this one the best. Simple and useful. Like the option to set up timers for different occasions.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I love how you can save and add tones for ending time. LOVE IT!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Too buggy.. weird. Doesnt seem to work when phone is off. Running app again doesnt bring me to previously started alarm.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Most it allows is 99 mins-I need 2 hours!
reviews.author: A Google User
